item.title: Gavin, we still love you for all that you do. * /r/btc
item.description:
Gavin, we still love you for all that you do. * /r/btc

I would be understandably shaken if I were you. We've all been there at some point in our lives. It's a great time to reflect. Don't worry about...

item.title: Does Bitcoin still matter? - BBC News
item.description:
Does Bitcoin still matter? - BBC News

Craig Wright's assertion that he was the creator of Bitcoin this week occurred at the same time as thousands of members of a growing industry tied to the virtual currency attended the Consensus 2016 conference in New York. Attendees debated the truth of Wright's claims, but also grappled with the more poignant question of whether Bitcoin still matters?

item.title: Ethereum (ETH) Price Trends: 5/06/2016
item.description:
Ethereum (ETH) Price Trends: 5/06/2016

Ethereum's price has formed an upward turnaround wave. Will there be a turn? Where will the upward trend be cancelled? There is a fortification at the level of $10, and a turnaround wave has been formed. In such conditions, the odds are lying with an upward turn. I.e.

item.title: Isle of Man Govt Grants 'Designated Business' Title to CoinCorner
item.description:
Isle of Man Govt Grants 'Designated Business' Title to CoinCorner

The Isle of Man has been quite open to any company or individual looking to venture into the world of Bitcoin and cryptocurrency. CoinCorner is the first company in the region to achieve Designated Business Status as the company is now officially licensed.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Analysis: 5/06/2016
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Analysis: 5/06/2016

An upward trend continues to form on Bitcoin. Disruption of the structure of that trend could provoke a new fall. Bitcoin's price has been bouncing off the bottom limit of the flat, which indicated that the bears were holding the advantage.

item.title: Bitcoin Wallet Samourai Goes Open-Source
item.description:
Bitcoin Wallet Samourai Goes Open-Source

"Users should look at our reputation thus far and make a judgement as to if we are honest and trustworthy, but at the end of the day code doesn't lie, we have produced the code, anyone can go take a look, can comment, can suggest, can criticize, can fork," a developer, who goes by 'SW', told CCN.

item.title: Scaling Bitcoin- Adam Back's Bitcoin Scaling Plan and Timeline
item.description:
Scaling Bitcoin- Adam Back's Bitcoin Scaling Plan and Timeline

Scaling Bitcoin: Adam Back's Bitcoin Scaling Plan and Timeline Many people in the Bitcoin community, myself included, worry about " The Future of Money" and its ability to scale, particularly in the near-future. There has been some lip service in 2016, but agreements and plans of action have been hard to come by.

item.title: Winklevoss Twins and Gemini Acquire Legal Rights to sell Ethereum's Ether
item.description: Winklevoss Twins and Gemini Acquire Legal Rights to sell Ethereum's Ether

item.title: Australian Government Outlines Three Solutions to Double Bitcoin Tax - CoinDesk
item.description:
Australian Government Outlines Three Solutions to Double Bitcoin Tax - CoinDesk

In March, the Australian government released a multi-faceted policy statement on financial technology that included items on both digital currencies as well as broader blockchain applications.
